lead_paragraph: The Labor Department said its Consumer Price Index slipped 0.1 percent after being unchanged in November.

headline.print_headline: Consumer Prices Slip, Sign of Low Inflation
headline.main: Consumer Prices and Housing Starts Dipped in December

snippet: The Labor Department said its Consumer Price Index slipped 0.1 percent after being unchanged in November.
abstract: Labor Dept reports Consumer Price Index fell 0.1 percent in December after being flat in November; decline offers sign of weak inflation that suggests Federal Reserve may not raise interest rates in March.
